mapper.select: SELECT g.group_name, sum(u.code_total) code_total FROM `x_group_user` gu left join x_group g on gu.group_id = g.group_id left join x_user u on gu.user_name = u.user_name group by gu.group_id

SELECT sum( t.total ) code_total, t.group_name FROM ( SELECT g.group_name, g.group_id, SUM( c.total ) total FROM `x_commit` c LEFT JOIN x_group_user gu ON c.committer_name = gu.user_name LEFT JOIN x_group g ON gu.group_id = g.group_id WHERE c.commit_date >= #{startDate} AND c.commit_date <=#{endDate} GROUP BY g.group_id, c.committer_name ) t GROUP BY t.group_id
